casebody.data:
J. A. ZACHARIASSEN & CO. v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 43372] [94 C. Cls. 315;

315 U. S. —]

Detention of foreign-owned vessel in wartime; refusal of •clearance, exercise of war powers.

Decided June 2, 1941; petition dismissed. Plaintiff’s motion for new trial overruled October 6, 1941.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court March 9, 1942.
